definition: underground watercourse/archaic variant of 經|经[jing1]
suitable/to one's liking/to get along together
to dance energetically/vigorous modern style of dance
to match one's strength with/to compete/more competitive/to set oneself against sb/disobliging/to make a special effort

sentences.english: H shut the window with such force that the glass broke.
sentences.chinese: 他關窗子用了那麼大的勁，玻璃都碎了。

sentences.english: And sometimes, it seems your community has faded when it is simply taking a breather.
sentences.chinese: 有時社區可能需要緩一緩勁，但您卻認爲它衰退了。

sentences.english: I don't find cricket very exciting.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得打板球隊沒有勁。

sentences.english: Putting forth a great effort, he uprooted the tree.
sentences.chinese: 他使了很大的勁把樹拔了出來。

sentences.english: Eg. The poor man beat his boss by means of Dutch courage.
sentences.chinese: 那個可憐的人借酒勁打了他的老闆。

sentences.english: The road was so small and not so straight that the driver had great trouble in driving along.
sentences.chinese: 這條路是那麼小和不太直，司機在開車時費了很大勁。

sentences.english: He tensed himself to defeat me in the game.
sentences.chinese: 他憋足了勁，要在這次比賽中贏我。

sentences.english: If you use a bit of elbow grease you'll get the floor clean.
sentences.chinese: 你只要用點勁，就能把地板擦乾淨。

sentences.english: He kicked her as hard as he could in the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 他卻使足了勁，朝妻子的肚子上踢了一腳。

sentences.english: Show to show west light Dutch courage, west light softhearted, two people attack relations.
sentences.chinese: 秀秀借酒勁向西光表達，西光心軟，二人發作了關係。

sentences.english: She lifted her eyes to his hard, lean face.
sentences.chinese: 她擡起眼瞅着他冷硬瘦勁的臉。

sentences.english: And every time we did it more, the number of jihadis grew.
sentences.chinese: 我們每多下一番勁，聖戰者數量就往上增長。

sentences.english: They had some difficulty in explaining this to him.
sentences.chinese: 他費了很大的勁，才向他說明了這件事。

sentences.english: It take effort to find a way out.
sentences.chinese: 我花了很大得勁才找到出路。

sentences.english: Today, television networks bidboiling point of the Madden people to unacceptable levels.
sentences.chinese: 今天沸點網絡電視爆料的勁爆到讓人不能接受的地步。

sentences.english: They have a natural and unrestrained enthusiasm, and insight into the world like state.
sentences.chinese: 他們對人對事有一股瀟灑勁，洞察世態的樣子。

definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
